tags 476610 + confirmed
retitle =EF=BB=BF476610 beagle: stalling other GTK+ applications ($HOME/.be=
agle/socket returns EAGAIN)
found =EF=BB=BF=EF=BB=BF476610 =EF=BB=BF0.3.5-1
thanks

On Sun, 2008-04-20 at 08:29 -0400, D Bera wrote:
> Which version of beagle and libbeagle do you have ?
> Thanks,
> - dBera

I can reproduce this bug with the following versions:

meebey@redbull:~$ dpkg -l beagle | grep ii
ii  beagle                                     0.3.5-1                     =
indexing and search tool for your personal data
meebey@redbull:~$ dpkg -l libbeagle1 | grep ii
ii  libbeagle1                                 0.3.5-1+b1                  =
library for accessing beagle using C
meebey@redbull:~$ dpkg -l gnome-color-chooser  | grep ii
ii  gnome-color-chooser                        0.2.3-2                     =
GTK+/GNOME desktop appearance customization tool

here a strace related snippet:

open("/usr/lib/libbeagle.so.1", O_RDONLY) =3D 15
stat64("/home/meebey/.beagle", {st_mode=3DS_IFDIR|0700, st_size=3D4096, ...=
}) =3D 0
stat64("/home/meebey/.beagle/socket", {st_mode=3DS_IFSOCK|0755, st_size=3D0=
, ...}) =3D 0
socket(PF_FILE, SOCK_STREAM, 0)         =3D 15
connect(15, {sa_family=3DAF_FILE, path=3D"/home/meebey/.beagle/socket"}, 11=
0) =3D -1 EAGAIN (Resource temporarily unavailable)
connect(15, {sa_family=3DAF_FILE, path=3D"/home/meebey/.beagle/socket"}, 11=
0) =3D -1 EAGAIN (Resource temporarily unavailable)

--=20
Regards,

Mirco 'meebey' Bauer
